description: Lift the following trees (applicant's ref.) as specified in Schedule of works January 2019:1 x Variegated Holly (9); 4 x Evergreen Oak (29, 141, 480, 610); 2 x Yew (nr 110, 644); 1 x Beech (612);Remove suckers / basal growth from the following trees (applicant's ref.) as specified in Schedule of works January 2019: 1 x Hornbeam (85); 2 x Wingnut (351, 361); 1 x Lime (360); 1 x Bay (408); 1 x Sycamore (509);Remove / Reduce branch(es) from the following trees (applicant's ref.) as specified in Schedule of works January 2019: 1 x Hornbeam (112); 2 x Hawthorn (113, 614); 1 x Beech (358); 1 x Deodar Cedar (423); 1 x Italian Alder (473); 1 x Atlas Cedar (474); 1 x Walnut (529); 1 x Red Oak (581); 1 x Silver Birch (604);Remove branches overhanging neighbouring properties in The Avenue, Lift to provide 4m clearance over the roadway:1 x Goat Willow (116);Cut back the following trees (applicant's ref.) as specified in Schedule of works January 2019:Line of Hollies (180 - 189); Yew and Holly group (343 - 349);Coppice the following trees (applicant's ref.) as specified in Schedule of works January 2019:3 x Hazel (497, 508, nr 567a);Remove reversion from the following tree (applicant's ref.) as specified in Schedule of works January 2019:1 x Variegated Sweet Chestnut (498);Clean trunk of the following tree (applicant's ref.) as specified in Schedule of works January 2019:1 x Cut leaf Oak (572);Remove regrowth from the following tree (applicant's ref.) as specified in Schedule of works January 2019:1 x Scarlet Oak (579);Pollard at 2m the following tree (applicant's ref.) as specified in Schedule of works January 2019:1 x Evergreen Oak (639);Fell the following trees (applicant's ref.) as specified in Schedule of works January 2019:3 x Hawthorn (nr 159, 448, 590); 3 x Cherry (333, 478, 607); Cherry saplings (333a);All standing in area A1 of Tree Preservation Order
